org.araneaframework.uilib.form.constraint
Class OrConstraint

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.form.constraint.BaseConstraint
      org.araneaframework.uilib.form.constraint.BaseCompositeConstraint
          org.araneaframework.uilib.form.constraint.OrConstraint
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Constraint
public class OrConstraint
extends BaseCompositeConstraint

This constraint implements "OR" Boolean logic (checks that at least one contained constraits is satisfied). It is eager by default, but can be set to act lazily.

Note that subconstraints produce error messages as they are being validated. Unless some custom error message has been set, it makes often sense to process all subconstraints.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
See Also:
Serialized Form

OrConstraint

public OrConstraint()

OrConstraint

public OrConstraint(Constraint constraint)
Creates an OrConstraint for one constraint. Other constraints can be added later with BaseCompositeConstraint.addConstraint(Constraint) or BaseCompositeConstraint.addConstraints(Collection) methods.

Parameters:
constraint - The constraint to validate.
Since:
1.0.9

OrConstraint

public OrConstraint(Collection constraints)
Creates an OrConstraint for a collection of Constraints. Other constraints can be added later with BaseCompositeConstraint.addConstraint(Constraint) or BaseCompositeConstraint.addConstraints(Collection) methods.

Parameters:
constraints - A collection of Constraints.
Since:
1.0.9

public void validateConstraint()
                        throws Exception
Checks that at least one contained constraits is satisfied.

Specified by:
validateConstraint in class BaseConstraint
Throws:
Exception - Any runtime exception that may occur.

setLazy

public OrConstraint setLazy(boolean lazy)
Sets whether this OrConstraint acts lazily, default is false.

Parameters:
lazy - If true then subconstraints will be validated lazily (until one of them succeeds). If false then all subconstraints will be validated.
Returns:
This OrConstraint.
